summary: A command‑line utility that converts Lumina model checkpoints into a Hugging Face Diffusers pipeline, loading the original weights, constructing the necessary autoencoder, scheduler, and text‑to‑image components, and exporting them to a directory compatible with Diffusers inference.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to migrate Lumina models to the widely‑used Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying deployment, sharing, and integration of text‑to‑image generation capabilities.
